title: Successful login for Admin user
description: Verify that an Admin user can successfully log in with valid credentials and is granted appropriate role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid Admin username and password
Click login button
Check login is successful and user dashboard appears with Admin privileges
Verify JWT token is stored in localStorage

title: Successful login for Security Guard user
description: Verify that a Security Guard can successfully log in with valid credentials and is granted appropriate role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid Guard username and password
Click login button
Check login is successful and user dashboard appears with Guard privileges
Verify JWT token is stored in localStorage

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify the system rejects login attempts with invalid or incorrect username/password combinations.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username and/or password
Click login button
Verify login fails with appropriate error message

title: Vehicle entry registration success with all required fields
description: Verify that vehicle entry form accepts all mandatory fields and successfully registers a new vehicle entry generating a unique token and timestamp.

steps.description: Log in as Security Guard
Navigate to vehicle entry registration form
Enter valid license plate, vehicle type, driver name, contact number, purpose, and capture driver photo
Submit the vehicle entry form
Check that entry is recorded with unique token ID and accurate timestamp
Verify dashboard vehicle count increments by one

title: Vehicle entry form validation for missing mandatory fields
description: Verify the vehicle entry form enforces mandatory fields and displays appropriate error messages when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Log in as Security Guard
Navigate to vehicle entry registration form
Submit form with one or more mandatory fields left blank
Verify form submission is blocked and shows relevant validation error messages

title: Vehicle exit search by license plate
description: Verify that the exit process allows the guard to search for a vehicle currently inside by license plate and proceed to log exit.

steps.description: Log in as Security Guard
Navigate to vehicle exit processing page
Enter a valid license plate of a vehicle currently inside
Submit search query
Verify vehicle details and entry record are displayed
Confirm the vehicle exit
Check exit timestamp is recorded and vehicle status updated
Verify dashboard vehicle count decrements by one

title: Vehicle exit search by token ID
description: Verify that exit processing allows searching vehicles by their unique token ID and properly logs the exit.

steps.description: Log in as Security Guard
Navigate to vehicle exit processing page
Enter a valid token ID for a vehicle inside
Submit search query
Verify vehicle and entry details are displayed
Confirm vehicle exit
Check exit timestamp is recorded and entry status updated

title: Attempt vehicle exit search with invalid or non-existing license plate
description: Validate that searching for vehicle exit with a license plate not inside shows an appropriate 'not found' message.

steps.description: Log in as Security Guard
Navigate to vehicle exit processing page
Enter a license plate that is not currently inside
Submit search query
Verify the system shows 'No active vehicle entry found' or equivalent message

title: Admin dashboard load performance and real-time vehicle count
description: Verify that the Admin dashboard loads within 2 seconds and displays real-time accurate count of currently parked vehicles.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to Admin dashboard
Check that dashboard loads completely within 2 seconds
Verify vehicle count matches current number of vehicles inside

title: Admin ability to approve or reject vehicle entry logs
description: Verify that Admin can approve or reject vehicle entries from the dashboard and the status updates correctly.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Open dashboard vehicle logs
Select a pending vehicle entry record
Approve the entry
Verify the status updates to 'Approved'
Reject another pending entry
Verify the status updates to 'Rejected'

title: Admin editing a vehicle entry record
description: Validate that Admin can edit existing vehicle entry records successfully and changes persist.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to dashboard logs
Select a vehicle entry to edit
Modify editable fields such as purpose or driver contact
Save changes
Verify the log updates and reflects edited data

title: Filter historical vehicle entry and exit reports by date range
description: Verify that the Admin can filter historical records by selecting specific start and end dates, and only matching records are shown.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to historical reports section
Select valid start date and end date
Apply filter
Verify that only records within selected date range are displayed

title: Export vehicle logs in CSV format
description: Verify that the Admin can export filtered vehicle entry and exit logs in CSV format without errors and the export contains required fields.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to historical reports
Apply date filters
Click export CSV button
Check that CSV file downloads successfully
Verify CSV contains correct and complete vehicle log data

title: Export vehicle logs in Excel format
description: Verify that the Admin can export filtered vehicle entry and exit logs in Excel format without errors and the file includes all necessary data fields.

steps.description: Log in as Admin
Navigate to historical reports
Apply date filters
Click export Excel button
Check that Excel file downloads successfully
Verify Excel file contains correct and complete vehicle log data

title: Print gate pass generation for verified vehicle entry
description: Verify that from the entry logs, a print-optimized gate pass can be generated correctly without errors and contains all relevant vehicle and driver details.

steps.description: Log in as User (Admin or Guard)
Navigate to vehicle entry logs
Select a verified and active vehicle entry
Open print gate pass page
Verify gate pass page loads in print-friendly format
Check vehicle details, driver info, token ID, timestamps are present and formatted properly

title: Concurrent vehicle entries stress test up to 100,000 records
description: Validate the system stability and data consistency while registering a high volume of vehicle entries and exits simultaneously.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent vehicle entry registrations up to 100,000 records
Verify no data loss or concurrency errors occur
Check all entries have unique token IDs and accurate timestamps
Simulate simultaneous vehicle exits for a subset
Verify exit timestamps are recorded properly and statuses updated

title: Mobile responsiveness of vehicle entry form on handheld devices
description: Verify that the vehicle entry registration form UI is fully functional, resizes properly, and is user-friendly on mobile and tablet device screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the vehicle entry form page on various mobile and tablet devices or emulators
Verify the form layout adapts correctly without horizontal scroll
Check that all input fields and buttons are easily tappable and usable
Complete and submit form on mobile device
Verify form submits successfully and proper confirmation is shown

title: Mobile responsiveness of Admin dashboard on handheld devices
description: Verify the Admin dashboard UI is fully responsive and usable on mobile and tablet devices including viewing logs and performing status updates.

steps.description: Access Admin dashboard page on mobile phones and tablets or emulators
Verify layout adjusts properly without content overlapping
Ensure all buttons, filters, and log details are accessible and functional
Perform entry approval and record editing from mobile view
Confirm actions complete successfully with UI feedback
